com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation

Class SVAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation.SVAnimation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SVAnimationSet, SVBasicAnimation, SVKeyFrameAnimation, SVSpriteAnimation, SVTransitionAnimation

    public abstract class SVAnimation
extends Object
    This class is the base animation class for all animation classes in the Visual View package.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SVAnimation.AnimationListener
      This listener interface receives animation events.

    • Field Detail

      • REGION

        public static final int REGION
        Region of slide.

        The Region is defined as a rectangle(left, top, width, height) with float array[4]. It is expressed in terms of absolute coordinates for the Slide.

      • POSITION

        public static final int POSITION
        Position of slide.

        The Position is defined as a point(x,y) with float array[2] It is expressed in terms of absolute coordinates for the Slide.

      • PIVOT_POINT

        public static final int PIVOT_POINT
        Pivot Point of slide.

        The Pivot Point is defined as a point(x,y) with float array[2] It is expressed in terms of relative coordinates for the Slide.

      • Z_POSITION

        public static final int Z_POSITION
        Z Position of slide.

        The Z position defines the Depth of the slide. It is expressed in terms of absolute coordinates for the Slide.

      • ROTATION

        public static final int ROTATION
        Rotation of slide.

        Rotation is defined as (x, y, z) with float array[3]

      • SCALE

        public static final int SCALE
        Scale of slide.

        Scale is defined for all the three axes (xScale, yScale, zScale) with float array[3]

      • BACKGROUND_COLOR

        public static final int BACKGROUND_COLOR
        Background color of slide.

        Background Color is defined as (R, G, B, A) with float array[4]

      • OPACITY

        public static final int OPACITY
        Opacity of slide.

        The Opacity of a slide is a float value between 0.0 and 1.0.

      • CORNER_RADIUS

        public static final int CORNER_RADIUS
        Corner Radius of slide.

        The Corner Radius is a float value.

      • SCALE_TO_FIT_REGION

        public static final int SCALE_TO_FIT_REGION
        Scale to Fit Region of slide.

        The Region is defined as a rectangle(left, top, width, height) with a float array[4].

      • TEXTURE_REGION

        public static final int TEXTURE_REGION
        Texture Region of slide.

        The Region is defined as a rectangle(left, top, width, height) with a float array[4]. It is expressed in terms of relative coordinates for the texture (Image).

      • LIGHT_COLOR

        public static final int LIGHT_COLOR
        Color of the light hitting the slide.

        The Light Color is defined as (R, G, B, A) with a float array[4]

      • LIGHT_ANGLE

        public static final int LIGHT_ANGLE
        Angle at which the light hits the slide.

        The Light angle with respect to the slide is as a float value.

      • LIGHT_POWER

        public static final int LIGHT_POWER
        Intensity of the light source.

        The light power is a float value.

      • LIGHT_OPACITY

        public static final int LIGHT_OPACITY
        Opacity of the light hitting the slide.

        The light opacity is a float value.

      • LIGHT_OFFSET

        public static final int LIGHT_OFFSET
        Light offset of Slide.

        The light source offset with respect to the slide is a float value.

      • LIGHT_RADIUS

        public static final int LIGHT_RADIUS
        Light Radius of slide.

        The Light type must be a Spot type.

        The Light source radius is a float value.

      • SHADOW_OPACITY

        public static final int SHADOW_OPACITY
        Shadow Opacity of slide.

        The Shadow opacity is a float value.

      • SHADOW_RADIUS

        public static final int SHADOW_RADIUS
        Shadow radius of slide.

        The Shadow radius is a float value.

      • SHADOW_OFFSET

        public static final int SHADOW_OFFSET
        Shadow offset of slide.

        The Shadow offset is a float value.

      • SHADOW_COLOR

        public static final int SHADOW_COLOR
        Shadow color of slide.

        The Shadow Color is defined as (R, G, B, A) with float array[4]

      • BORDER_COLOR

        public static final int BORDER_COLOR
        Border color of slide.

        The Border Color is defined as (R, G, B, A) with float array[4]

      • BORDER_WIDTH

        public static final int BORDER_WIDTH
        Border Width of slide.

        The border width is a float value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SVAnimation

        public SVAnimation()
        Creates an instance of SVAnimation

    • Method Detail

      • setDuration

        public void setDuration(int duration)
        Set the specified duration for the animation in milliseconds

        The duration time is animation's running time in milliseconds

        Parameters:
        duration - Amount of time in milliseconds that the animation runs.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the duration of the animation is a negative value.

      • getDuration

        public int getDuration()
        Get animation duration in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        int Amount of time in milliseconds that the animation runs.

      • setInterpolator

        public void setInterpolator(int interpolator)
        Set the specified interpolator for the animation.
        Parameters:
        interpolator - Interpolator used by the animation, see the list of interpolators in the SV class for more information. This Value should lie between (0 ~ 41)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - The interpolator type must lie between 0 ~41 , any value outside the range throws IllegalArgumentException
        See Also:
        SV

      • getInterpolator

        public int getInterpolator()
        Get the interpolator used in the animation.
        Returns:
        int Interpolator used by the animation, see the list of interpolators in the SV class for more information
        See Also:
        SV

      • setRepeatCount

        public void setRepeatCount(int repeatCount)
        Set the number of times the animation is repeated.

        You can automatically restart animations after each cycle ends.

        Default value is 0

        Parameters:
        repeatCount - Number of times the animation repeats.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if repeat count is a negative value.

      • getRepeatCount

        public int getRepeatCount()
        Get the number of times the animation is repeated.
        Returns:
        int Number of times the animation repeats.

      • setOffset

        public void setOffset(int offset)
        Set the specified offset for the animation in milliseconds.

        The offset time is the time that elapses before the animation starts.

        .

        The default value for animation offset is 0.

        Parameters:
        offset - Amount of time in milliseconds that elapses before the animation starts.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if offset value is negative.

      • getOffset

        public int getOffset()
        Get the offset for the animation in milliseconds.

        The offset time is the time that elapses before the animation starts.

        Returns:
        int Amount of time in milliseconds that elapses before the animation starts.

      • setAutoReverseEnabled

        public void setAutoReverseEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable the auto-reverse property for the animation.

        If auto-reverse is enabled, the animation goes back to its initial property state at the end of the animation.

        Parameters:
        enabled - Set to true to enable auto-reverse.Set to false to disable auto-reverse. The default value is false.

      • isAutoReverseEnabled

        public boolean isAutoReverseEnabled()
        Check if auto-reverse is enabled for the animation.
        Returns:
        true if auto-reverse is enabled, false otherwise.

      • getAnimationFromEngine

        public SAAnimation getAnimationFromEngine()
        Get the animation at the engine side.
        Returns:
        The handle for the animation.

      • getAnimationHandle

        public int getAnimationHandle()
        get Animation's handle value. This value is pointer of animation.
        Returns:
        animation handle value

      • setAnimationListener

        public void setAnimationListener(SVAnimation.AnimationListener listener)
        Set the specified AnimationListener instance.
        Parameters:
        listener - AnimationListener instance for receiving animation start, stop, and repeat events.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if listener object is null.
        See Also:
        SVAnimation.AnimationListener
